Content: It's all meaningless. No matter what dreams or hopes you had, it's all the same if you're shredded by rocks. Everyone will die someday. Does that mean life is meaningless? Would you say that of our fallen comrades? Their lives, were they meaningless? No, they weren't! It's us who gives meaning to our fallen comrade's lives! We die trusting the living who follow to find meaning in our lives! That is the sole method in which we can rebel against this cruel world!
Author: Erwin Smith
